title: Can't connect to PVP.net?
body: Is anyone else having this problem? I'm trying to record a game for a video but It keeps telling me I can't connect to PVP.net, it isn't my internet as I'm making this post right now, and I can log in, just can't play a game. Any ideas as to why this is happening?

replies.body: I have the same problem! So frustrating.
